0902005307
Địa chỉ
No.99, Ban Co Street, District 3, Ho Chi
Minh city, Quậận 3, Thành phốố Hồồ Chí Minh
THÔNG TIN CHUNG
- Expected Jobs/Position: Team Leader - Technical Architect
   + love to set up a new team, help to improve skills of members 
   + design software architecture, write/review code lines, solving
problems daily
- From now to the next year
   + JavaScript: AngularJs, ReactJs, NodeJs, React Native
   + Database: Oracle 10g, SQL Server 2k, MySQL, Postgresql
   + Others: Mean Js, Redis, RabbitMQ, Elastic Search, Socket
Cluster
   + Platform: Azure & Amazon
   + SharePoint 2013, 2016, Online
- Github: https://github.com/anhvoduy
K Ỹ  NĂNG
Accounting
Python
Nodejs
AWS Services
Inventory
Angular JS
Ecommerce
SharePoint 2013
Azure Cloud Platform
ReactJS
KINH NGHIỆM LÀM VIỆC
04/2018 - Present
SSE - Technical Leader FE + BE
Harvey Nash - JWB Mobile Alive
From 04/2018 - 08/2018: Technical Leader FE: React Js + Redux
Store + Redux Form
From 09/2018 - 04/2019: Technical Leader BE: Node Js + Posgress
DB
JWB - Mobile Alive is a human resource management system by a
web admin, a web mobile. 
Database: Postgress
Server Side: NodeJs, Socker Cluster
Client Side: React Js + Redux Store + Redux Form: Web Admin &
Web Mobile (PWA)
Hosting: Amazon EC2 + Posgresql RDS
The system is a human resource & payroll reports, includes 2 sub
systems:
 - web admin: import/export, insert update employee, divisions,
leave/unavailability request
 - web mobile (PWA): to display self data & submit
leave/unavailability request
09/2016 - 03/2018
Senior Software Engineer - Back End
Harvey Nash
Project: e-commerce system
Platform :
- Server Side: Node Js, Express, Redis, Rabbit MQ, Elastic Search,
Azure Storage
- Client Side Web : Angular Js, Boostrap, Web Responssive
- Client Side Mobile: IOS, Android
In this system:
- Web API by Node Js must be developed and supported both Web
Amin (SPA) and Mobile App (IOS + Android).
- Web API: NodeJs, Redis, RabbitMQ, Elastic Search, Azure Storage
- The code at Back End - API: must be written clearly, readable,
reusable and passed unit tests.
11/2015 - 08/2016
Senior Software Engineer
Harvey Nash
Project: SharePoint Online - Web Content Management
Platform: SharePoint Online, Angular.js, Graph Api, Responssive
Design
- Content management, workflow approval process
- Managed metadata: term store taxonomy and navigation
- Search configuration: search service, search center, refiner, custom
display templates
- Support multi-languages: UI web site & content management
- Power Shell and CSOM for deployment & configuration
05/2015 - 10/2015
Senior Software Engineer
CSC - Computer Science Corporation
Project: Asset Management System - Web Application
Platform: MVC 5, Web API, EF 6 + Boostrap, Angular Js
- Server Side: EF 6, MVC, Web API with Json
- Client Side: responsive: boostrap, angular-trap  + apps by angular
js: mvc + directives
12/2014 - 04/2015
Senior Software Engineer
CSC - Computer Science Corporation
Project: Ministry of Law (Singapore)
Publishing Portal - Enterprise Content Management
Platform: SharePoint 2013 + Responsive Design + Client Side
Programming
- Upgrade from SharePoint 2010 to SharePoint 2013.
- Migrate documents/ contents to new system.
- Web Responsive: Boostrap  + Knockout Js, JQuery with CSOM,
REST
- Managed Metadata Service: Terms Taxonomy, Terms Navigation
- Search Service: crawling, crawled propeties, managed properties,
other data source providers
- Customize Search Center: refiner, custom display templates,
search result pages, query rules, ranking models.
- Configure SharePoint 2013 Farm: PowerShell script.
07/2014 - 11/2014
Senior Software Engineer
CSC - Computer Science Corporation
Project: Intellectual Property Office (Singapore)
Migrate data and  develop Document Management
System, Workflow Approval, Policy Retention
Platform: SharePoint 2013: custom webparts by C# + power shell
- Upgrade from SharePoint 2010 to SharePoint 2013.
- Migrate documents to new system.
- Manage Metadata Service: define Terms Taxonomy
- Search Service: crawling, crawled propeties, managed properties.
- Customize Search Center: refiner, custom display templates,
search result pages.
- Design & Customize Workflow Approval Process
- Configure SharePoint 2013 Farm: PowerShell script.
09/2012 - 09/2013
Project Manager - Technical Leader
FPT Information System - FIS SOFT
Project: Ministry of Commerce (Kingdom of Cambodia)
this project included two main sub systems: Trade Information
Website & Certificate of Origin System.
Platform: SharePoint 2010: custom webparts, infopath forms,
workflow approval, report builder.
- Define site columns, content types, list definitions, folder structures.
- Customize language package & localize site columns, content
types, resource files.
- Develop custom actions, event receivers, wcf services, custom
webparts, application pages by C#.
- Form Library: design and develop Infopath Form.
- Workflow: design, customize, develop SharePoint Workflow Multiple
Approval Process
- Report: BCS, External Content Type, External Datasource, Report
Builder, Excel Service with SQL 2012.
- Search: support English and Khmer languages.
- Install & Configure SharePoint 2010 in 3 tier farm architecture: 
Two Web Front End Servers
One Application Server, One Search Server
One Database Server
Integration SharePoint to AD, Mail Exchange
(*) Search Server was added later after UAT.
01/2011 - 08/2011
Project Manager - Technical Leader
FPT Information System - FIS SOFT
Project: The Bank Of Tokyo and Mitsuibishi UFJ
Description: design and develop financial & statistic reports system
Technology: Window Form in .Net 2.0, Dev Express control,
Aspose, Crystal Report, C# Programming.
- Define data structure: financial & statistic reports.
- Import data from Core Banking, File Data.
- Write store procedure & design reports by Crystal Reports.
- Write code to export data to Excel Template File by Aspose.
01/2010 - 12/2010
Technical Leader
FPT Information System - FIS SOFT
Project: Vina Kyoei Steel Company
Description: design & develop Inventory, Accounting, Reports
System to VKS.
Technology: Window Form in .Net 2.0, Dev Express control, Crystal
Report, C# Programming, WCF Service.
- Cash Management: cash deposit & withdraw
- Currency: VND + JPN + USD by exchange management
- Account Payment and Account Receipt Management
- Inventory Management
- Fixed Asset Management
- General Ledge & Financial Reports: Balance Sheet, Income
Statement, Cash Flow (Direct & Indirect)
05/2008 - 12/2009
Software Engineer
FPT Information System (FIS BANK)
Project: Mirae Asset Securities Company.
Description: develop/deploy Core Securities (Index) to MAS,
support other projects: Online Trading, HOSE Gateway, HNX
Gateway
Technology: .Net 1.1, Web Service, Crystal Report 10, Oracle 10g.
In Core Securities: develop modules: Cash & Deposit, Stock
Management, Order Management + Matching Orders, General
Ledge, Finance Reports.
In Online Trading: develop functions: create orders, view orders,
reports (by ASP.Net 2.0)
In HOSE Gateway & HNX Gateway: support integrate to HOSE/HNX
for sending/receiving data.
In SMS Gateway: support integrate to SMS system for sending
notification.
04/2007 - 04/2008
Software Engineer
T&T Solution
Inventory & Accounting System
- develop on Visual Foxpro, Visual Basic 6.0, SQL Server 2000/2005
- deploy on Windows Server 2k3, Windows XP
HỌC VẤN
09/2002 - 06/2008
Information Management System
Cử nhân - Marketing & Finance University
- 2006-2007: start to work at T&T Solution
- 2008-2013: work at FPT Information System
- 2014-2015: work at CSC
- 2016-now :  work at Harvey Nash
strong skills: AngularJs, ReactJs, NodeJs  +  SharePoint
reference: https://github.com/anhvoduy
microsoft: https://mcp.microsoft.com/Anonymous/Transcript/Validate 
THÔNG TIN THAM KHẢO
Pham Quoc Vuong
Software Director tại Cambopay
vuongpq@gmail.com |
Nguyen Ngoc Linh
Software Director tại FPT Information System
